oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Army Bombers softball team
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ten men and a boy are posing for a group portrait with a softball and two bats on the ground. Nine of the men wear "Army Bombers" sports uniforms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Softball; Softball players; Sports
Beaman, James A.; Blaely, Frank; Hencke, Bud; Pritchell, John; Nemeth, Louis; Shields, Gene; Shirman, Bob; Sims, R. R.; Stoetzel, Pete; Wallbaun, Phil; Wirijowski, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of August 8, 1946. From left to right on the front row; Gene Shields, R. R. Sims, John Pritchell (mascot), Ed Wirijowski, Frank Blaely. Second row, left to right; Pete Stoetzel, Phil Wallbaun, Bob Shirman, Bud Hencke, Louis Nemeth, and James A. Beaman.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
